argument.description: An expression that represents the string value to be hashed.
An expression that represents the string value to be hashed.

description: The HASH function returns a 128-bit, 160-bit, 256-bit or 512-bit hash of the input data, depending on the algorithm selected, and is intended for cryptographic purposes.
sample:
values  hash('Charlie at IBM', 1)
